user-authorized-key.title: User Authorized Key
user-authorized-key.description: SSH public key in order to connect to the SSH server of this runner instance.

instance-amount.title: Partition Amount
instance-amount.description: Number of slappart to deploy inside the runner (default is 10). Needs instance to be restarted.

slapos-software.title: Pre-selected Software Release
slapos-software.description: a relative path from the slapos git repo to a folder containing a software release, which will be automaticaly deployed while the runner instanciation, and only if the parameter auto-deploy is set to 'true'. For example: 'software/helloworld

auto-deploy.title: Automatically Deploy Software
auto-deploy.description: Authorizes the software declared with 'slapos-software' to be automatically deployed, or not. Needs instance to be restarted. (default is false)

slapos-repository.title: SlapOS Git Repository URL
slapos-repository.description: url of the default git repository that will be download by the runner while its instanciation. Will be cloned in a directory named 'slapos' (default is https://lab.nexedi.com/nexedi/slapos.git)

slapos-reference.title: SlapOS Git Branch Name
slapos-reference.description: Branch or hash on which the default repository will checkout (default is master)

auto-deploy-instance.title: Automatically Deploy Instances
auto-deploy-instance.description: Prevent the runner from deploying and starting instances. Needs instance to be restarted. It is set to false for instances of type 'import' in resiliency in any case (default is false)

autorun.title: Automatically Run Sofware/Instance
autorun.description: Let automaticaly build and run a declared software with 'slapos-software'. Only works if 'slapos-software' is set, and 'auto-deploy' is true. Needs instance to be restarted. (default is false)

slapos-software-type.title: Deployed Instance Software Type
slapos-software-type.description: Software type of your instance inside the runner

custom-frontend-backend-url.title: Custom Frontend Backend URL
custom-frontend-backend-url.description: return an ipv4 frontend of the given ipv6(+optional port)

custom-frontend-backend-type.title: Custom Frontend Backend Type
custom-frontend-backend-type.description: The type of the frontend slave instance to ask

custom-frontend-basic-auth.title: Custom Frontend Basic Auth
custom-frontend-basic-auth.description: if the ip given with 'custom-frontend-backend-url' is secure, set it to true for the promise do not fail

custom-frontend-instance-guid.title: Custom Frontend Instance GUID
custom-frontend-instance-guid.description: Instance guid of the frontend you whish to use

custom-frontend-software-type.title: Custom Frontend Software Type
custom-frontend-software-type.description: SoftwareType of the frontend you request (default is RootSoftwareInstance)

custom-frontend-software-url.title: Custom Frontend Software URL
custom-frontend-software-url.description: Software Url of the frontend you request (ie.: http://git.erp5.org/gitweb/slapos.git/blob_plain/HEAD:/software/apache-frontend/software.cfg)

check-custom-frontend-promise.title: Check Custom Frontend Promise
check-custom-frontend-promise.description: Enable a promise to check that HTTP frontend created from custom-frontend-backend-url is available

monitor-port.title: Monitor Port
monitor-port.description: Allow to manually change the port on wich the apache server running monitoring interface is listening. The default value for the webrunner is different from the default value of the standalone stack-monitor server (default 9684)

cpu-usage-ratio.title: CPU Usage Ratio
cpu-usage-ratio.description: Ratio of the CPU use for compilation, if value is set to n, compilation will use number-of-cpu/n of cpus (need instance restart)

resilient-clone-number.title: Number of Resilient Clones
resilient-clone-number.description: Number of clones to be deployed when a resilient runner, if missing a single clone is provided. Its value can be 1 or 2

instance-name.description: Name of the instance, to show in the window title
